author: travisty-
body:
This code will never get executed, and its logic is
duplicated in the HandleStopJobCompleted() method.

Closes #1696.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Thanks for the contribution @travisty-. I'll merge it once we get the tests to pass.

title: StopJobCommand: Remove Unreachable Code
